name: transform-clump
description: A transform stream that returns clumps of data.

scripts.test-spec: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test mocha -b --reporter spec
scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec
scripts.test-coveralls: npm run lint && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
